name: XFN Design Review Template
description:
This cross-functional design review template has been essential in fostering a safe environment for cross-functional collaboration and growing general design literacy across the companies I served.


This template is my way of combining visual standup and design review into one meeting, so people can get educated on what's been going on within design and the reasons behind design decisions, and a way for designers to solicit feedback and critique. You can't have great designs without great feedback ;)


Would you please leave a like and comment below on what worked for you and what changes you had to make?


Thank you!
